css._notice_: This section is for manually disabling/enabling features.
css._removeappleLogo_comment: Removes Apple Logo when enabled. (true by default)
css._removeupsell_comment: Removes the open iTunes button if enabled (true by default)
css._macosWindow_comment: This enables the MacOS window frame. (false by default)

preferences._notice_: This is the basic user preferences. Modify to your liking below.
preferences._defaultTheme_comment: Default UI theme (Light/Dark) or leave empty to detect from system.
preferences._cssTheme_comment: If you are using a custom CSS theme, set it below, otherwise leave empty.
preferences._closeButtonMinimize_comment: Should the close button minimize your apple music (true) or should it quit the app (false). (true by default)
preferences._discordRPC_comment: Enable/Disable Discord Rich Presence. (true by default)
preferences._notifications_comment: Enabling this means you will get notifications when you change song.
preferences._tooltipsongname_comment: Enabling this option allows you to see the song name in the tooltip on the taskbar when the application is minimized to the tray.
